alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued September 30 at 1:18PM MDT until October 01 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected, generally above 6,000 feet elevation, with snow briefly mixing in at times as low as 5,000 feet elevation. Total snow accumulations up to 7 inches above 6,000 feet, with minor accumulations below 6,000 feet. * WHERE...East Glacier Park Region. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Back country recreation conditions will be cold and raw due to snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will begin this afternoon, increasing in intensity late this afternoon and evening. Snow then decreases in intensity late tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
